body_html: @aluo-x Yes, it's for Windows. The reason for this is that MSVC is not very good at SFINAE, as you can see in this page. So it will be confused when there're multiple choices of functions with the different argument types. We should add some direct function declarations to make it work. Now you also have to wait for #3686 to pass.

body: @aluo-x Yes, it's for Windows. The reason for this is that MSVC is not very good at SFINAE, as you can see in this [page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh567368.aspx). So it will be confused when there're multiple choices of functions with the different argument types. We should add some direct function declarations to make it work. Now you also have to wait for #3686 to pass.
